source.3eeab68f:

data[data["type"]=="Movie"]["release_year"].value_counts()[:20].plot(kind="bar",color="green")
plt.title("Frequency of Movies which were released in different years and are available on Netflix")
source.41413d0c:

source.19c32948: In the above data, we can choose to drop the director and cast columns completely as they are not a huge part for us while we visualize the data and they dont add any significant value to our analysis. We are only focused on visualizing this data hence dropping two columns wont be any trouble for us.But this should not be a regular practise as if we are making a recommender system, we cannot drop the director and cast of a movie as these are a key feature used to recommend movies to users.
